me.normanmaurer.niosmtp
Interface SMTPResponse

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAuthResponseCallback.SMTPAuthResponse, SMTPResponseImpl
public interface SMTPResponse

The SMTP Response which is send back from the SMTP Server to the client

Author:
Norman Maurer

Field Summary
static char LAST_SEPERATOR
          Separator which is used to separate the last line
static String LINES_SEPERATOR
          Separator for multi-line SMTPResponse's
static char SEPERATOR
          Separator which is used to separate the code from the rest of the line for multi-response SMTPResponse's
 
Method Summary
 int getCode()
          Return the return code
 List<String> getLines()
          Return all lines of the response as an unmodifiable List.
